channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 00:22 Drive anxiety in the Odesa region. Follow the subsequent messages.
item.description: 🟢 00:22 Drive anxiety in the Odesa region. Follow the subsequent messages.#Odessa_ex This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 23:38 Drawing of anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Manganese and Marganetsky territorial community of Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigoriva Territorial Community
item.description: 🟡 23:38 Drawing of anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Manganese and Marganetsky territorial community of Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigoriva Territorial Community#Dnepropetrovsk_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
